meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Richard Bannin Bob Porowski Molly Redfield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1606.

div.div: First game of Season 8. First game with new set.

td.p: Richard Bannin, a fundraising director from New York City, New York
Bob Porowski, a data processing manager from East Brunswick, New Jersey
Molly Redfield, a Ph.D. candidate from Claremont, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $43,399)

tr.td: TRANSPORTATION
MYTHOLOGY
SPORTS
JAZZ
ODDS & ENDS
SERVING SUGGESTIONS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'These flat-bottomed boats were specially designed to travel down early canals')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: These flat-bottomed boats were specially designed to travel down early canals

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Bob: What is silver?)

gold

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Robert Browning\'s poem about him contains the line "Rats! They fought the dogs and killed the cats"')

tr.td: POETRY
Robert Browning's poem about him contains the line "Rats! They fought the dogs and killed the cats"
Molly
Bob
Richard
2nd place: trip on Aerocancun to Mexico & stay at Hotel Oasis Cancun
3rd place: Yashica Zoomtec camera & NES with Super Jeopardy! + Wheel of Fortune & InfoGenius for Game Boy
New champion: $12,601
Molly
Bob
Richard

21 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W
(including 1 DD)
